recipe.title: Quick and Easy Bean Salad
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups cooked or 1 (15-ounce) can low-sodium or no-salt-added cannellini beans or other white beans, drained
1 teaspoon no-salt seasoning blend, adjusted to taste
instructions: Mix all the ingredients in a bowl.
Serve cold as a salad or heat in the microwave for a warm entrée.
